info.comment:
Movie Maker
by
Fun Games
----------
Only a small movie maker which works like a stop motion video in the program ´pivot`. Create your own little videos with a person.
Sorry, the project doesn´t work online. There was a problem with the variables. If you want to play, download, if not try my other projects!
----------
On the bottom you can see a number. It shows on wich picture you work on. Coose the different pictures with the arrows to review. Press the ´New´-button to copy the activ picture and to create a new one.
On the Top are the settings. There you can move the person, turn the parts of the body,add sounds and other things for each picture. The ´Main settings´ apply to all pictures and the other settings for the activ picture.
If you think you´re done, it´s showtime. Click the ´Play´-button and watch your final result.
----------
The music is called ´chocholate´ and from www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/87080
----------
I hope you have great fun and enjoy. So comment and click the love-it button!
----------
info.author: -Scratcher-
